about_the_game:
Specter Trail is a gripping horror game set in the ominous Vanderbilt estate. Step into the shoes of Fares, a private investigator, as you uncover the dark secrets surrounding the mysterious Vanderbilt family. This game combines a noir aesthetic with supernatural elements for a truly haunting experience.

Key Features


  • Linear Storyline: Follow a compelling narrative with unexpected twists and chilling discoveries.
  • Atmospheric Setting: Explore the detailed and moody Vanderbilt family history, designed to keep you on edge.
  • Unique Gameplay Mechanics: Engage in a mix of investigation, exploration, and survival.
  • Supernatural Elements: Encounter eerie specters and unravel paranormal mysteries.
  • Engaging Soundtrack: A haunting score that enhances the game’s atmosphere.
  • Lore Discovery: Unearth hidden lore that deepens your understanding of the game's world and its dark secrets.

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5500 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Specter Trail is a gripping horror game where you play as Fares, a private investigator unraveling the dark secrets of the Vanderbilt family. Immerse yourself in a linear narrative filled with unexpected twists, eerie specters, and challenging puzzles.
